education.degree: Full Stack Web and Mobile Development

projects.description: Developing a “fill in the blank” worksheet with the goal of developing a teaching aid for language learning. Users input a block of text and select words to be removed. Data persistence implemented through DatabasePersistence class utilizing PostgreSQL. Worksheet editing and deleting functionality achieved though SQL statements to update database.

Designed a portfolio website in React to host personal projects with design inspiration taken from a popular fitness tracker app. Organized content into a JSON file, stored as application state, to map content iteratively to populate content.

Created a command line playable version of the card game twenty-one using Ruby. Incorporated classes to initialize cards and their values to produce a running total providing users the choice to “hit” or “stay” based on their current value.
Game play programing tutorial in Unity and C#. Implemented player boundaries, power-ups, and enemy spawn rates and locations.
